channel.title: The Queen's Podcast with Wendy Weiss
channel.description: Listen in to cold calling tips and techniques with Wendy Weiss, The Queen of Cold Calling.

image.title: The Queen's Podcast with Wendy Weiss

channel.itunes:author: Wendy Weiss, The Queen of Cold Calling
channel.itunes:summary: Why Do Customers Leave? In this Cold Calling Tips Podcast, Wendy Weiss, The Queen of Cold Calling™, discusses Why Customers Leave--And What Can You Do to Get Them to Stay.

item.title: Your Goal is the Answer
item.description: Why is it so difficult to schedule appointments with prospects? What is the number one reason that keeps sales professionals from scheduling appointments with prospects? In this Cold Calling Tips Podcast, Wendy Weiss, The Queen of Cold Calling™, shares how Your Goal is the Answer.
item.itunes:author: Wendy Weiss, The Queen of Cold Calling
item.itunes:summary: Why is it so difficult to schedule appointments with prospects? What is the number one reason that keeps sales professionals from scheduling appointments with prospects? In this Cold Calling Tips Podcast, Wendy Weiss, The Queen of Cold Calling™, shares how Your Goal is the Answer.

item.title: Cold Call Scripts: What Not to Say to the Gatekeeper
item.description: Every cold call begins with the attempt to identify the decision- maker and then get that decision-maker on the phone to have a selling conversation. Before reaching your prospect, however, you will usually encounter either human gatekeepers or voice mail, or both. In this Cold Calling Tips Podcast, Wendy Weiss, The Queen of Cold Calling™, reveals, Cold Call Scripts: What Not to Say to the Gatekeeper
item.itunes:author: Wendy Weiss, The Queen of Cold Calling
item.itunes:summary: Every cold call begins with the attempt to identify the decision- maker and then get that decision-maker on the phone to have a selling conversation. Before reaching your prospect, however, you will usually encounter either human gatekeepers or voice mail, or both. In this Cold Calling Tips Podcast, Wendy Weiss, The Queen of Cold Calling™, reveals, Cold Call Scripts: What Not to Say to the Gatekeeper

item.title: Cold Calling, Overcoming Rejection, Overcoming Fear & More!
item.description: The Queen of Cold Calling™ was recently interviewed for a publication in South Africa. In this Cold Calling Tips Podcast, Wendy Weiss, The Queen of Cold Calling™, shares her answers about Cold Calling, Overcoming Rejection, Overcoming Fear & More!
item.itunes:author: Wendy Weiss, The Queen of Cold Calling
item.itunes:summary: The Queen of Cold Calling™ was recently interviewed for a publication in South Africa. In this Cold Calling Tips Podcast, Wendy Weiss, The Queen of Cold Calling™, shares her answers about Cold Calling, Overcoming Rejection, Overcoming Fear & More!

item.title: What Not to Do in an Introductory Email
item.description: Are your emails being scanned and deleted? It happens more often than you think. In this Cold Calling Tips Podcast, Wendy Weiss, The Queen of Cold Calling™, shares What Not to Do in an Introductory Email
item.itunes:author: Wendy Weiss, The Queen of Cold Calling
item.itunes:summary: Are your emails being scanned and deleted? It happens more often than you think. In this Cold Calling Tips Podcast, Wendy Weiss, The Queen of Cold Calling™, shares What Not to Do in an Introductory Email

item.title: Google It!
item.description: What a difference a couple of decades makes… Twenty years ago you could call a prospect, not have a clue about the company you were calling and still have a successful result. Not today! In this Cold Calling Tips Podcast, Wendy Weiss, The Queen of Cold Calling™, shares why you must Google It!
item.itunes:author: Wendy Weiss, The Queen of Cold Calling
item.itunes:summary: What a difference a couple of decades makes… Twenty years ago you could call a prospect, not have a clue about the company you were calling and still have a successful result. Not today! In this Cold Calling Tips Podcast, Wendy Weiss, The Queen of Cold Calling™, shares why you must Google It!

item.title: How Not to Follow Up
item.description:
Why does follow-up fail? In this Cold Calling Tips Podcast, Wendy Weiss, The Queen of Cold Calling™, shares How Not to Follow-Up
with Prospects (and What to Do Instead).
item.itunes:author: Wendy Weiss, The Queen of Cold Calling
item.itunes:summary:
Why does follow-up fail? In this Cold Calling Tips Podcast, Wendy Weiss, The Queen of Cold Calling™, shares How Not to Follow-Up
with Prospects (and What to Do Instead).

item.title: How to Stop Creating Prospect Objections
item.description: Are you frustrated by prospect objections? Does it seem that prospects simply do not understand? In this Cold Calling Tips Podcast, Wendy Weiss, The Queen of Cold Calling™, shares How to Stop Creating Prospect Objections.
item.itunes:author: Wendy Weiss, The Queen of Cold Calling
item.itunes:summary: Are you frustrated by prospect objections? Does it seem that prospects simply do not understand? In this Cold Calling Tips Podcast, Wendy Weiss, The Queen of Cold Calling™, shares How to Stop Creating Prospect Objections.

item.title: Why Sales Don't Close
item.description: Are you sick to death of losing sales that you thought were going to close? Tired of the last minute surprises that torpedo your ‘sure thing?’ In this Cold Calling Tips Podcast, Wendy Weiss, The Queen of Cold Calling™, shares Why Sales Don’t Close
item.itunes:author: Wendy Weiss, The Queen of Cold Calling
item.itunes:summary: Are you sick to death of losing sales that you thought were going to close? Tired of the last minute surprises that torpedo your ‘sure thing?’ In this Cold Calling Tips Podcast, Wendy Weiss, The Queen of Cold Calling™, shares Why Sales Don’t Close

item.title: Successful Business by Phone.
item.description: Are you setting yourself up for success or dooming yourself to failure? In this Cold Calling Tips Podcast, Wendy Weiss, The Queen of Cold Calling™, shares the truth about Successful Business by Phone.
item.itunes:author: Wendy Weiss, The Queen of Cold Calling
item.itunes:summary: Are you setting yourself up for success or dooming yourself to failure? In this Cold Calling Tips Podcast, Wendy Weiss, The Queen of Cold Calling™, shares the truth about Successful Business by Phone.

item.title: Cold Calling Warrior Delusion
item.description: What is the truth about cold calling? So many people believe so many negative myths about cold calling that sometimes it’s almost impossible to see beyond the darkness... In this Cold Calling Tips Podcast, Wendy Weiss, The Queen of Cold Calling™, debunks the Cold Calling Warrior Delusion.
item.itunes:author: Wendy Weiss, The Queen of Cold Calling
item.itunes:summary: What is the truth about cold calling? So many people believe so many negative myths about cold calling that sometimes it’s almost impossible to see beyond the darkness... In this Cold Calling Tips Podcast, Wendy Weiss, The Queen of Cold Calling™, debunks the Cold Calling Warrior Delusion.

item.title: Call me in January
item.description: It’s the holidays. Should you even bother trying to prospect? In this Cold Calling Tips Podcast, Wendy Weiss, The Queen of Cold Calling™, reveals what to say when your prospect says, “Call me in January…”
item.itunes:author: Wendy Weiss, The Queen of Cold Calling
item.itunes:summary: It’s the holidays. Should you even bother trying to prospect? In this Cold Calling Tips Podcast, Wendy Weiss, The Queen of Cold Calling™, reveals what to say when your prospect says, “Call me in January…”

item.title: Letting Go is Hard
item.description: What are the secrets of the top 20%? In this Cold Calling Tips Podcast with Wendy Weiss, The Queen of Cold Calling™ reveals the secrets of the top 20% and how they close more sales.
item.itunes:author: Wendy Weiss, The Queen of Cold Calling
item.itunes:summary: What are the secrets of the top 20%? In this Cold Calling Tips Podcast with Wendy Weiss, The Queen of Cold Calling™ reveals the secrets of the top 20% and how they close more sales.

item.itunes:summary: What are the secrets of the top 20%? In this Cold Calling Tips Podcast with Wendy Weiss, The Queen of Cold Calling™ reveals the secrets of the top 20% and how they close more sales.

item.title: Cold Calling: Getting to "Yes"
item.description: “Go through the ‘no’s’ and hang ups until someone finally says, ‘yes.’” Ecch! No wonder so many people hate cold calling. In this Cold Calling Tips Podcast with Wendy Weiss, The Queen of Cold Calling™ debunks the myth that when it comes to cold calling rejection comes with the territory.
item.itunes:author: Wendy Weiss, The Queen of Cold Calling
item.itunes:summary: “Go through the ‘no’s’ and hang ups until someone finally says, ‘yes.’” Ecch! No wonder so many people hate cold calling. In this Cold Calling Tips Podcast with Wendy Weiss, The Queen of Cold Calling™ debunks the myth that when it comes to cold calling rejection comes with the territory.

item.title: 2011-11-9 You Are Selling
item.description: What is selling? When are you selling? Are you always selling? Where is the line? In this Cold Calling Tips Podcast, Wendy Weiss, The Queen of Cold Calling™, shouts out: You Are Selling
item.itunes:author: Wendy Weiss, The Queen of Cold Calling
item.itunes:summary: What is selling? When are you selling? Are you always selling? Where is the line? In this Cold Calling Tips Podcast, Wendy Weiss, The Queen of Cold Calling™, shouts out: You Are Selling

item.title: Another What Not to Do on a Cold Call Email
item.description: Tired of sending your cold call email off into cyberspace with no response from the prospect you’ve targeted? You may be making mistakes that would cause your prospect to instantly hit delete. In this Cold Calling Tips Podcast, Wendy Weiss, The Queen of Cold Calling ™, discusses Another What Not to Do on a Cold Call Email.
item.itunes:author: Wendy Weiss, The Queen of Cold Calling
item.itunes:summary: Tired of sending your cold call email off into cyberspace with no response from the prospect you’ve targeted? You may be making mistakes that would cause your prospect to instantly hit delete. In this Cold Calling Tips Podcast, Wendy Weiss, The Queen of Cold Calling ™, discusses Another What Not to Do on a Cold Call Email.

item.title: What can cold callers learn from politicians?
item.description: What can cold callers learn from politicians? In this Cold Calling Tips Podcast, Wendy Weiss, The Queen of Cold Calling ™, gives her Vote for Cold Calls.

item.title: How musicals are just like cold calling
item.description: What can musical theater genius Stephen Sondheim teach you about cold calling? In this Cold Calling Tips Podcast, Wendy Weiss, The Queen of Cold Calling™, shows how musicals are just like cold calling.

item.title: The Cold Calling Script that Will Not Work
item.description: Are you struggling to gain your prospect’s attention? Are you unable to schedule the appointments you need? In this Cold Calling Tips Podcast, Wendy Weiss, The Queen of Cold Calling™, discusses The Cold Calling Script that Will Not Work.

item.title: The New Law of Action
item.description: Are you struggling to get motivated to cold call? In this Cold Calling Tips Podcast, Wendy Weiss, The Queen of Cold Calling™, reveals the new Law of Action to fill your sales funnel with qualified prospects.

item.itunes:summary: Are you struggling to get motivated to cold call? In this Cold Calling Tips Podcast, Wendy Weiss, The Queen of Cold Calling™, reveals the new Law of Action to fill your sales funnel with qualified prospects.

item.title: Are You Selling
item.description: What is selling? When are you selling? Are you always selling? Where is the line? In this Cold Calling Tips Podcast, Wendy Weiss, The Queen of Cold Calling answers the questions 'Are You Selling?'
item.itunes:author: Wendy Weiss, The Queen of Cold Calling

item.title: Formula for Responding to Objections
item.description: When cold calling, are you frustrated, demoralized and stumped by prospect objections? No more! In this Cold Calling Tips Podcast, Wendy Weiss, The Queen of Cold Calling™ shares The Formula for Responding to Prospect Objections.
item.itunes:author: Wendy Weiss, The Queen of Cold Calling
item.itunes:summary: When cold calling, are you frustrated, demoralized and stumped by prospect objections? No more! In this Cold Calling Tips Podcast, Wendy Weiss, The Queen of Cold Calling™ shares The Formula for Responding to Prospect Objections.

item.title: Finding the Prospects Who Will Say "Yes"
item.description: In business to business cold calling it is imperative to find the best prospects: prospects that are ready to buy, buy a lot and then who will come back and buy even more. In this Cold Calling Tips Podcast, Wendy Weiss, The Queen of Cold Calling™, reveals the cold calling secrets to Finding the Prospects Who Will Say, "Yes"
item.itunes:author: Wendy Weiss, The Queen of Cold Calling
item.itunes:summary: In business to business cold calling it is imperative to find the best prospects: prospects that are ready to buy, buy a lot and then who will come back and buy even more. In this Cold Calling Tips Podcast, Wendy Weiss, The Queen of Cold Calling™, reveals the cold calling secrets to Finding the Prospects Who Will Say, "Yes"

item.title: What Not to Do on a Cold Call Email
item.description: Sometimes it is truly impossible to reach a prospect by telephone cold calling - and for some prospects email is their preferred form of communication. While nothing beats the direct interaction of a live cold call, sometimes instead of a cold call you simply have to send a cold call email. If you do so, however, be careful. Don't let this happen to you. In this Cold Calling Tips Podcast, Wendy Weiss, The Queen of Cold Calling™, discusses What Not to Do on a Cold Call Email.
item.itunes:author: Wendy Weiss, The Queen of Cold Calling
item.itunes:summary: Sometimes it is truly impossible to reach a prospect by telephone cold calling - and for some prospects email is their preferred form of communication. While nothing beats the direct interaction of a live cold call, sometimes instead of a cold call you simply have to send a cold call email. If you do so, however, be careful. Don't let this happen to you. In this Cold Calling Tips Podcast, Wendy Weiss, The Queen of Cold Calling™, discusses What Not to Do on a Cold Call Email.
